item.title: Some quick confirm
item.dc:creator: @Darthax Darthax
item.description:
@Darthax wrote:

hi i wonted to change how bandos boss heals now i think im rite is this what i need to change

npcs[NPCID].HP += 60;

to say like

npcs[NPCID].HP += 10;

or to stop it all together

npcs[NPCID].HP -= 3;

Read full topic
